name: School Summer Sports Athletics
description:
Welcome to the annual high school day, where you get a chance to become sports man of the year in the high school sports day game, exhibit the true sports man spirit in various sports like swimming pool race, an exciting hurdle race where you can win gold medal if you stood first, if you want to play multiple sports mini games compiled in a single package then without waiting any further download one of the best sports game now, and enjoy all sports in one game. Play with the multiple cartoonish characters, choose the characters from different races, white or black because we care for our players to the core of our heart.

Features of Virtual High School Sports Day:
Detailed cartoonish characters white and black
Multiple sports indoor and outdoor games.
Smooth controls for all the games.
Addictive and engaging game play.
Multiple time and task based levels.
